entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 12.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
